DOC.detailed_description: This cross-over randomized trial . The order treatment receive randomly select participant tell treatment receiving . Subjects fall one four treatment group describe : 1 . 2 week active rTMS treatment follow washout 2 week sham 2 . 2 week sham follow washout 2 week active rTMS treatment 3 . 4 week active rTMS treatment follow washout 4 week sham 4 . 4 week sham follow washout 4 week active rTMS treatment For washout period two intervention , plan minimum 2 week avoid problem carryover effect . Prior start next intervention washout period , re-assess subject 's tinnitus severity . To ensure carryover effect , washout period extend subject whose tinnitus severity , define THI , 20 point different baseline THI score .
